text: 4.15: Ef 1.22; 4.25; Kor 1.18; 1 Zo 3.18Nza khuarir mba khesharigi bunin rɨgɨrga fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza guigira wari won ndavir wari ga ndɨɨi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨv, vhɨra khaŋ tɨgɨp buni guari bun suanga. Nza maaŋ muunga, nza havhargiap ki gumgi gu mbigi kɨv, nza guigira Krais phorgɨrga, ana nzan pan ma.
